name: OpenRW
body:
# For Users

OpenRW is in an early state of development. It's not currently possible to play through much of the game using OpenRW. Check back soon and keep refreshing the [OpenRW Subreddit](https://reddit.com/r/openrw) for more information as it happens.

# For developers

Development is happening in the [OpenRW Repository](https://github.com/rwengine/openrw). If you want to talk about development, drop into the #openrw IRC channel on chat.freenode.net.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
